Reviews.Content: This hotel manager saved our trip! We arrived at the hotel totally dejected, since our most important piece of luggage containing wedding clothes and gifts had not turned up at the airport, and the personnel had no idea where it was. We were leaving early the next morning for another city and despaired of ever seeing it again. The hotel manager, Gijs Schelvis, telephoned, used the computer and worked literally hours until he located it, and the next morning we retrieved it at the airport. Without his help, our trip would have been a great disappointment, to say the least. He was quick, efficient and relentless in helping us. In addition the small, cozy hotel was very clean and attractive, in a quiet little town about 20 minutes from the airport with a free shuttle to and fro. The room was very small but comfortable and after all, this is Europe! I recommend it.
Reviews.Author: bunski
